data.text: A smooth, sweet, cold food prepared from a frozen mixture of milk products and flavorings, containing a minimum of 10 percent milk fat and eaten as a snack or dessert.
data.attributionText: from The American HeritageÂ® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A confection made by congealing variously flavored cream or custard in a vessel surrounded with a freezing-mixture.
A <xref>dessert</xref> made from <xref>frozen</xref> <xref>sweetened</xref> <xref>cream</xref> or a similar substance, usually <xref>flavoured</xref>.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: A snack consisting of ice cream on a stick or in a wafer cone.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: frozen dessert containing cream and sugar and flavoring
